room_title: Escape room "Pirates!" by Riddle Me Roanoke in Roanoke
room_description:
Captain Blackbeard is legendary in his conquests of the seven seas. His notorious crew members are renowned for their cunning and skillful buccaneering.
Blackbeard is tired of quickly losing so many crew members, so he has prepared a test of skill to weed out unworthy applicants. You have been told to report to the ship, where you will have one hour to prove your worth. It takes more than a sharp sword and strong back to meet Blackbeard's standards. You will need to prove that your mind is as sharp as your sword. Do you have what it takes?
